Text:

Not cool!
i cant even play this...whats up with that?
wtf, just convert the freakin files.  Do a simple google search.  A. its Minor Threat, and B.  its free, don't bitch
Thanks BrettvN!  I converted  the files to .mp3 and am seeding a torrent with them.
May i ask how i convert the files :P?

Convert wma to mp3 using an earlier 'registered' version of winamp (Microsoft threatened nullsoft with legal shit 'cos of winamps ability to write decoded wma files to disc- so this was removed in later versions). Set output to write to disc, and set output format to what you want- like mp3, wav.  (EAC can do high quality wav to mp3 compressions if lame codec is used)
